thread.title: Piolo Pascual Has Been Dating Shaina Magdayao for 5 Years - Preen
thread.title_full: Piolo Pascual Has Been Dating Shaina Magdayao for 5 Years - Preen

author: Jacque De Borja
title: Piolo Pascual Has Been Dating Shaina Magdayao for 5 Years - Preen
text:
By Jacque De Borja Shaina and Piolo at last year’s Star Magic Ball. 
It’s hard to keep a showbiz relationship private with prying eyes and social media, so it came as a big surprise when we found out that Piolo Pascual is actually dating Shaina Magdayao. For. Five. Years. 
Piolo and Shaina recently divulged about the relationship during a press conference. They have been exclusively dating for about five years already, but why keep it a secret until now? Apparently it was because of mutual respect, they did not want to make things public. 
Even after years of dating, Piolo still doesn’t want to label the relationship, what matters is that they value, treasure, and appreciate what they both have. 
Shaina, on the other hand, wants to take things slow. She shared that she values commitment and that is why she is taking her time. She said that if she will have a boyfriend, that means he’s probably the one she wants to marry and while she waits for that to happen, she’ll focus on work. 
Let that sink in for Valentine’s Day, Piolo Pascual (who we lovingly call Papa P) is taken. Now pass the chocolates and lemonade moscato , please.
